Sentencas: A thorough understanding of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance and reactants' distribution through modeling and numerical simulation has become essential.
Titulo: A lattice Boltzmann analysis of the performance and mass transport of a solid oxide fuel cell with a partially obstructed anode flow channel

Sentencas: In this paper, a comprehensive numerical model based on a lattice-based Boltzmann method was developed to numerically handle gas flow in the partially blocked channel and concentration polarization in porous electrodes while assessing the performance of such a SOFC.
Titulo: A lattice Boltzmann analysis of the performance and mass transport of a solid oxide fuel cell with a partially obstructed anode flow channel

Sentencas: After model validation with available experimental data, effects of the blocks height, their number, and the cathode/anode-side flow channel blockage are investigated.
Titulo: A lattice Boltzmann analysis of the performance and mass transport of a solid oxide fuel cell with a partially obstructed anode flow channel

Sentencas: Block insertion has been shown to speed up gas progression while enhancing mass transport from the channel to the anode/electrolyte interface and that the performance of the involved SOFC is better compared to a straight channel.
Titulo: A lattice Boltzmann analysis of the performance and mass transport of a solid oxide fuel cell with a partially obstructed anode flow channel

Sentencas: The findings demonstrate that the SOFC performance improves by increasing both the blocks number and their height.
Titulo: A lattice Boltzmann analysis of the performance and mass transport of a solid oxide fuel cell with a partially obstructed anode flow channel

Sentencas: Specifically, a 90% block with five blocks would improve power density by 14.4%.
Titulo: A lattice Boltzmann analysis of the performance and mass transport of a solid oxide fuel cell with a partially obstructed anode flow channel
